metadata.dc:author: Silva, Daniel H
metadata.dc:description: This paper is about the interplay between autonomy and integrity in individuals in the context of the doctor-patient relationship. It analyses the concepts of autonomy, competence and rationality, related to the notion of individual integrity. It further provides a practical guide for the assessment of competence levels to be used by training doctors and therapists.
metadata.dc:title: Una aproximación a los conceptos de autonomía e integridad en la praxis asistencial.
[An approximation to the concepts of autonomy and integrity in clinical practice].
